pages.text: Element is the branch of light and dark, which is the energy with attributes differentiated from each individual's different understanding of light and dark. In essence, it is using the super causal power ( that is, the power of light and dark). $(l)This kind of energy can exist in and be extracted from the individual$(). $(br2)When the creature carrying the elemental energy dies, $(l) a origin energy will be produced$()

Origin energy can't provide any element attributes but only the most fundamental energy. When you are close to the origin energy, it will transfer energy to your body and increase the limit of the max energy you can control, which also determines the upper energy limit you can output when there is no stored energy inside the magic items.

In addition to the upper limit of absorbed energy, you can also change your own element attributes to utlize the power of elements. What you need is the energy from $(#ffdd00)Element Deprivation$(0). You can extract the $(l)elemental energy$() from other creatures by using the weapon with the enchantment of$(#ffdd00) Element Deprivation $(0)to kill creatures.
